articles.title: Aqua-Rex's Disruptive Technology Offers an Alternative to Current Methods of Treating the World's Hard Water Problems
articles.description: In an era where sustainability and efficiency are no longer optional choices, Aqua-Rex steps into the breach.
articles.content: For nearly a century, an unchanged technology has been used to address the significant negative effects of hard water. Ion exchange is a method that works, but at a high expense, a high cost to the environment, and poor reliability. In an era where s... [4364 chars]

articles.title: AI sparks creativity and can beat writer’s block, says Bloomsbury chief
articles.description: Nigel Newton said the technology can support almost all of the creative arts but that it would not have the power to replace big names.
articles.content:
More authors will lean on AI to spark creativity and beat writer’s block, the boss of Harry Potter publisher Bloomsbury has said.
Nigel Newton, the publisher’s founder and chief executive, said the technology can support almost all of the creative ar... [2850 chars]

articles.title: Book Review: ‘The Future Of Storytelling’ By Charles Melcher
articles.description: 'The Future of Storytelling' explores how immersive, interactive, and AI-driven “living stories” are reshaping media, blending technology, creativity, and human connection.
articles.content: Charles Melcher’s The Future of Storytelling is a richly illustrated, deeply informed exploration of how immersive, interactive, and participatory media are redefining human expression. Drawing on his decades of work at the intersection of publishing... [2207 chars]

articles.title: Stress management techniques explained by Dr Kamlesh Singh
articles.description: the department of psychology at shri vishwanath yadav tamskar postgraduate autonomous college, durg (science college) successfully organised an online lecture on stress management by dr kamlesh singh, professor, indian institute of technology, delhi. the programme began with a welcome address by the college’s principal, dr ajay singh. principal stated that no one is immune to mental stress these days. stress also has physical symptoms, which can be clearly seen. he emphasised that this topic is very relevan
articles.content:
